newsitem.title: CHINA: HUANGSHAN TOURISM INTERIM NET UP 101PC.
newsitem.headline: HUANGSHAN TOURISM INTERIM NET UP 101PC.

text.p: Half year ended June 31, 1997 (in millions of yuan unless stated, against 1996 figures)
Net asset per share 2.56 yuan vs 1.61 yuan
Earnings per share 0.164 yuan vs 0.168 yuan
Company name: Huangshan Tourism Development Co Ltd.
It issued 37.5 million domestic currency A shares in April 1997.
Note: the results were contained in a company statement published by the Shanghai stock exchange on Friday.
The figures are unaudited as Chinese securities rules do not require listed firms to have their interim results audited.
Trading in the company's A and B shares would be suspended next Monday morning, the statement said.
